no_available_records: No available records, please scan something first
name: Name
privacy_policy_message: Lazy1922 only uses your GPS and stores all data locally. No data is sent to the server.
about_message: Lazy1922 is a tool to help you scan 1922 SMS messages.
add_favorites_guide:
To add to your favorites:

1. Scan a QR code first.
2. Tap the edit button.
3. Tap the plus card.
4. Give it a name, and you're done!
upgrade_premium_message: Upgrade to Lazy1922 Premium to avoid scaning QR codes everywhere.
favorite_places_description: Tap the star to add to your favorites
smart_suggestions_description: Get suggestions from favorite places according to your current location.
home_widgets_description: Send 1922 SMS messages directly from your home screen.
backup_and_restore_description: Keep all your favorite places when switching to a new phone.
